products.name: Bari Maple Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Bariguarantees an economical choice within our ABCD character grade Maple. We assure you the smooth surface selection will give a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its classic light grey Maple color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of UV Lacquer to achieve excellent protection together with a satin sheen and is also smooth for the interest of elegant texture while maintaining a sleek presentation.

products.name: Casoria Maple Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Casoriaguarantees an economical choice within our ABCD character grade selection and we assure you that it will give a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its classic Natural Maple color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of Satin Sheen UV Lacquer to create both a natural feel and look while maintaining excellent protection. Together with light sanding and wire brushing treatments, these floors boast an elegant texture while maintaining their sleek presentation.
